p: In our study area, different plant parts harvest for the preparation of herbal remedies (e.g., seed, root, flower, and leaf). The interview results revealed that leaves were the most frequently used part of the medicinal plants 28.43% of the total, followed by the seed (17.5%), whole plant (13%), bulb (11.27%), rhizome (8.4%), other parts (7.6%), flower (7%) and fruit (6.8%) ( TableÂ 2).
